name: Home Before Dark (superjacob)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50.

Home Before Dark is a simple, randomly generated game where you must beat the setting sun. In order to be faster than the sun and make it home on time, you must chain speed boosts to keep the sun from setting!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement, Space: Jump, Escape: Pause

Thanks for checking out my game. It's not as good as I envisioned it but I'm still proud for my first time for a game jam.
